tool.name: Prepare data

param.name: junior
param.label: Use junior run specimen naming convention

configfiles.configfile: PLATE_ID="${plate_id}" JUNIOR="${junior_conditional.junior}" #if $junior_conditional.junior == "" ZONE_ID="${junior_conditional.zone_id}" #else ZONE_ID="1" #end if SAMPLE_INFO="${sample_info}" BARCODES="${barcodes}" LABELS="${labels}" METADATA="${metadata}"

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
This tool parses sample information and creates a mapping of samples to barcodes. The sample information file must contain the columns ``sampleid``, ``barcode``, and ``reverse``, and can optionally contain a ``zone`` column also.
